content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #87490 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
I agree with P-low, it's invalid code, though this comment points out also a regression.
Also a thought about these tickets found by code fuzzers: we used to classify them generally in the P-medium area even when harmless (i.e. plainly wrong code and perhaps compile suggests how to fix).

I'm starting to see them more in the P-low area. I'd try perhaps to assign a P-medium or above only when the fuzzer finds an actual issue/regression. I'm afraid that too many P-medium issues will dilute the meaning and increase the background noise
